SEARCH
Package Utils.Events

Class EventFactory

java.lang.Object
Utils.Events.EventFactory
public class EventFactory extends Object
A factory class for creating instances of various types of events in the system. This class provides static methods to create specific event objects, such as RegularEvent, ErrorEvent, ImageStateEvent, and ServerEvent, based on the provided parameters. This approach encapsulates the instantiation logic of events, promoting loose coupling and enhancing code maintainability.

Each method within the factory is dedicated to a specific event type, ensuring that the necessary data for each event type is correctly provided and encapsulated within the new instance. This facilitates a consistent and straightforward way to generate events throughout the system.

    • createRegularEvent

      public static Event createRegularEvent(String message, EventTypes type)
      Creates a RegularEvent with the specified message and event type.
      Parameters:
      message - The message describing the event.
      type - The type of the event, as defined by EventTypes.
      Returns:
      A new instance of RegularEvent.

    • createErrorEvents

      public static Event createErrorEvents(String message, EventTypes type, SeverityLevels severityLevel)
      Creates an ErrorEvent with the specified message, event type, and severity level.
      Parameters:
      message - The message describing the event.
      type - The type of the event, as defined by EventTypes.
      severityLevel - The severity level of the event, as defined by SeverityLevels.
      Returns:
      A new instance of ErrorEvent.

    • creteImageStateEvent

      public static Event creteImageStateEvent(String message, EventTypes type, ImageStates imageState, SplitImage splitImage)
      Creates an ImageStateEvent with the specified message, event type, image state, and split image object.
      Parameters:
      message - The message describing the event.
      type - The type of the event, as defined by EventTypes.
      imageState - The current state of the image processing task, as defined by ImageStates.
      splitImage - The SplitImage object associated with the event.
      Returns:
      A new instance of ImageStateEvent.

    • createServerEvent

      public static Event createServerEvent(String message, EventTypes type, ServerStates serverState, int identifier)
      Creates a ServerEvent with the specified message, event type, server state, and identifier.
      Parameters:
      message - The message describing the event.
      type - The type of the event, as defined by EventTypes.
      serverState - The current state of the server, as defined by ServerStates.
      identifier - An identifier associated with the event (e.g., server ID).
      Returns:
      A new instance of ServerEvent.
